data.message: Shit...Eminem hasn't changed clothes since he did his Trump crap video!  Lol, people are just made cuz the 44 year old granny rapper made a fool out of himself by looking like a teenager throwing a tantrum cuz they mad at thier parents.  All the classic signs were in tbe video, tellin daddy "i hate you", jumpin up and down like a fool, giving the bird, drawing a line in the sand( lol...seriously though), talkin in an annoying whinny voice, forgettin what to say, runnin around in circles, childish insults(the laughable your orange line)... i could go on forever! I wonder if he got sent to his room?

replies.message: Oooohhhhh, you got me...i see what you did there.  Why didn't you point out that i didn't(and still aren't) capitalize my i's or that "cuz" really isn't a word!  Or that i used three periods in a row. Or that the exclamation point after "forever" really isn't necessary. Or that i typed "made" when i really meant "mad", or when i typed "tbe" when i meant "the". Why didn't you use your grammar nazi skills to point any of these out?  I bet you were like "Haha, i got him. He he used the wrong spelling of you're...busted!"  Bravo my friend, bravo!  You can't see but i am standing and clapping.
